memberdef.name: KOKKOS_IMPL_IS_CONCEPT
memberdef.initializer: template <typename T> \ struct is_##CONCEPT { \ private: \ template <typename, typename = std::true_type> \ struct have : std::false_type {}; \ template <typename U> \ struct have<U, typename std::is_base_of<typename U::CONCEPT, U>::type> \ : std::true_type {}; \ template <typename U> \ struct have<U, \ typename std::is_base_of<typename U::CONCEPT##_type, U>::type> \ : std::true_type {}; \ \ public: \ static constexpr bool value = \ is_##CONCEPT::template have<typename std::remove_cv<T>::type>::value; \ constexpr operator bool() const noexcept { return value; } \ };
